concept.title: 5322.101-1 General

conbody.p: Contracting officers must involve the Regional Labor Advisors in all labor relation actions outlined in FAR Part 22, as required. AFI 64-106 , Air Force Industrial Labor Relations Activities, identifies the Regional Labor Advisors and their assigned geographical areas.
